argo.correlation_reduction.correlation_reduction.correlation_reduction_methods module¶

Classes for reducing correlated features

class argo.correlation_reduction.correlation_reduction.correlation_reduction_methods.AgglomerativeClusteringFeatureReduction(threshold: float, strategy: str, similarity_function: object, columns_performance=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Removes similar columns (given a similarity function) by calculating the simility matrix then iteratively running Agglomerative Clustering on the similarity matrix and dropping columns that are correlated. Only one column per cluster is kept.

columns_to_keep¶

The final list of columns with the correlated columns removed.

Type

list

fit(X: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, print_clustermap=False) → None[source]¶

Calculates the similar columns in the dataset X.

Parameters

  • X (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe to be reduced.

  • print_clustermap (bool, optional) – If True, the clustermap at each iteration will be printed. Defaults to False.

transform(X: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Removes similar columns from the dataset X.

Parameters

X (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe to be reduced.

Returns

Dataframe with the similar columns removed.

Return type

pd.DataFrame

fit_transform(X: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, print_clustermap=False) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Calculates the similar columns in the dataset X, then removes them.

Parameters

  • X (pd.DataFrame) – Dataframe of binary columns.

  • print_clustermap (bool, optional) – If True, the clustermap at each iteration will be printed. Defaults to False.

Returns

Dataframe of dissimilar binary columns.

Return type

pd.DataFrame
